name: 50's Time Capsule
effect: Once per turn, if a player has a character here, that player may shuffle one item in her discard pile back into her Resource Deck.

name: A Fervant Wish
effect: For the remainder of the game, whenever another card allows exactly one player to draw a card, all of that player’s opponents draw a card.

name: A Lover's Gift
effect: Spike only. Choose one of your supporting characters in play. That character may swap one skill with Spike, just like swapping items. Any talent requirements must still be met. Send to the crypt after use.

name: A Soul's Revenge
effect: If Jenny Calendar, or a character that has the Orb of Thesulah attached is used to defeat this challenge, you gain 1 extra Destiny Point (or 2 extra if both). Trait Requirement: Spellcraft.

name: Amy Madison
effect: Human. Spellcraft. Once per turn, fatigue Amy Madison during the Resource Step to refresh any character with the Spellcraft trait.

name: An American Werewolf in Sunnydale.
effect: Face only at night. When you choose Oz to face this challenge, and you have enough Destiny Points to ascend, you may search your Resource Deck for Oz level 2, ascend Oz and shuffle the Resource Deck. Trait Requirement: Occult

name: Angel
effect: Vampire. When Angel starts a fight, draw 1 extra card.

name: Angelus
effect: Angelus does not get a –1 to his talents when fatigued. If Angelus wins a fight against a Hero, you gain 1 extra Destiny Point.

name: Angelus
effect: Vampire. Angelus gains +2 Smarts while facing a challenge.

name: Angelus
effect: Vampire.

name: Angry Mob
effect: Willow only. Move all of your Companions to Willow’s location. This does not count as a move. None of your characters may move for the remainder of this step. Send to the crypt after use.

name: Anywhere But Here
effect: Swap a location you control with another legal location in the Crypt. No characters may occupy the location when you swap.

name: Army Base
effect: During the Prologue Step, if you have at least two refreshed characters here, all your opponents must discard two cards, if possible

name: Attack of the Stunt-Doubles
effect: No one can play skills and items into talent stacks for the remainder of this fight or challenge.

name: B.O.
effect: If you win this challenge, both players discard their entire hand instead of down to 5 cards.

name: Bad Alcohol
effect: Fatigue a character participating in this fight or challenge.

name: Bad Eggs
effect: Assign to any school location.

name: Billy Fordham
effect: Human. While located at the Sunset Club, Billy Fordham is considered to be a Villain instead of a Minion.

name: Black Lagoon Aromatherapy
effect: During a challenge, this character gains the Occult Trait, +1 Weirdness. If assigned to Gill Monster, it gains an additional +2 Weirdness when facing challenges.

name: Blind Panic
effect: Choose a location in play. All Companions and Minions at that location are placed in Sunnydale Park.

name: Body of a Dead Cheerleader
effect: Must be assigned to a Villain or Minion. Character gains +1 Weirdness. If this card is attached to Chris Epps, he gains an additional +1 Weirdness.

name: Box of Goodies
effect: Choose a challenge in play. Raise all talents listed on that challenge by 1 until the end of the turn.

name: Breaking Free
effect: The Master only. Look at any player’s Challenge Deck and rearrange it in any order. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Buffy Summers
effect: Human. You can only use this card if Buffy is your main character. Buffy cannot start a fight. Fatigue Buffy during the Resource Step to fatigue any character at her location.

name: Cameron Walker
effect: Human. When resolving a fight, you may replace Cameron’s Butt-Kicking with his Charm. Talent stacks are excluded from this effect.

name: Candy Tactics
effect: Until the end of this turn, you do not lose any Destiny Points when a Companion or hero loses a fight.

name: Choke Hold
effect: Buffy only. Buffy gains +3 Butt-Kicking for the remainder of the fight or challenge. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Claddagh Ring
effect: Angel only. Discard this card during the Resource Step and choose one of your opponent’s characters at this location. That character may not start a fight with Angel for the remainder of the turn.

name: Coach Marin
effect: Human. Coach Marin gains +1 Butt-Kicking while at the same location as Gill Monster.

name: Collin, The Annointed One
effect: Vampire. Demonology. All Vampires at this location gain +2 Butt-Kicking. Once per Resource Step, you may search your Resource Deck for any Vampire, show it to your opponent, and place it in your hand.

name: Competition Appraisal
effect: Spike only. If Spike wins this fight or challenge, choose a skill that you placed into a talent stack and attach it to Spike instead of discarding it. Spike does not fatigue to attach the skill. This effect does not count towards the 1 skill per turn limit. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Concealed Weapon
effect: Giles only. If Giles participates in this challenge, any items that are placed into a talent stack give +2 to the chosen talent instead of +1. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Confrontation
effect: Buffy only. Use during any step. Refresh Buffy and draw a card. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Cordelia
effect: Cordelia is considered a hero instead of a Companion. Once during the end step you may rearrange the top 2 cards of your challenge deck in any order.

name: Cordelia
effect: Human. When Cordelia starts a fight choose Charm or Butt-Kicking. The chosen Talent is now the Resolving Talent for this fight.

name: Cut From the Same Cloth
effect: Angel only. Until the end of the turn, your opponent’s Minions and Companions are considered Vampires when fighting Angel.

name: Dalton
effect: Vampire. Occult.

name: Death
effect: For the remainder of the game, any supporting characters that are defeated in a fight are sent to the Crypt instead of the discard pile.

name: Death Stalks the Dream
effect: This challenge can only be faced at night. If Der Kindestod is used to defeat this challenge, you gain +1 extra Destiny Point.

name: Der Kindestod
effect: Demon. Fatigue during the Resource Step to give a Human here –1 to all talents for the remainder of the turn. If at the Hospital, the Human gets a –2 instead.

name: Desperate Maneuvers
effect: Angelus only. Until the end of the fight, Angelus gains +1 Weirdness or Charm. Immediately set aside this card into a talent stack to boost Weirdness or Charm. Send to the Crypt when no longer in talent stack.

name: Diana's Touch
effect: Character needs Spellcraft to attach. Fatigue this character to give a chosen character +3 Charm for the remainder of the turn.

name: Die Young and Stay Pretty
effect: Assign to the Sunset Club. Billy Fordham must be used to defeat this challenge.

name: Disembodied Arm
effect: Character gains +3 Weirdness during challenges. If this character is defeated in a fight, the winning character may attach the Disembodied Arm if it can hold another item. Return this item to the original owner’s discard pile when this item leaves play, or when the game ends. Limit 2 per deck.

name: Doug Perren
effect: Human. Science. Occult. Fatigue Doug Perren during the Resource Step and choose 1 character. That character may attach an extra skill this turn.

name: Dragon's Cove Magic Shop
effect: During the Movement Step you may move to any town location instead of an adjacent location from Dragon’s Cove Magic Shop.

name: Drusilla
effect: Vampire. Fatigue Drusilla during the Resource Step and discard a card. Draw 2 cards.

name: Ethan Rayne
effect: Human. Spellcraft. All other Minions sharing a location with Ethan Rayne gain the Demonology Trait while with Ethan.

name: Ethan's Costume Shop
effect: Ethan Rayne and Rupert Giles gain +1 Weirdness while at this location.

name: Everyday Vamp Hijinks
effect: Assign to a Vampire. Discard Everyday Vamp Hijinks during a challenge and choose a talent. This character gains +2 to that talent for the remainder of the challenge.

name: Fatal Recovery
effect: You may either search your Resource Deck for the level 1 of your Main Character and place it into your hand, or discard a card from your hand and draw a card.

name: Finding Your Destiny
effect: Willow only. Once this turn, Willow can participate in a challenge at another location without having to move there. If that challenge is defeated, Willow does not fatigue. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Flashy Swordfight
effect: Buffy only. Buffy gains +1 Butt-Kicking for the remainder of the fight. The resolving talent for this fight is now Butt-Kicking. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Forceful Persuasion
effect: Giles only. If Giles is facing a challenge that does not require Butt-Kicking, you may use his Butt-Kicking in place of his Smarts. Talent Stacks are excluded from this effect.

name: Full Moon
effect: When this event is played, the turn becomes night and cannot be changed to day for the remainder of this turn. For the remainder of the game, players need 1 less Destiny Point to ascend characters.

name: Gathering of Scoobies
effect: Willow only. For the remainder of this turn, all supporting characters gain +1 Smarts when facing challenges that require Smarts, and may Stunt-Double for Willow even if they are fatigued. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Gill Monster
effect: Monster. Gill Monster gains +1 Butt-Kicking while at an outdoor location.

name: Going Goth
effect: This card’s effect can only be used at night. Choose one of your characters in play. That character gains the Vampire Trait until the end of the turn.

name: Grounded
effect: Choose a character in play. That character cannot move for the remainder of this step.

name: Gypsy Curse
effect: Character needs Occult to attach. Fatigue this character to fatigue a Minion.

name: Henchmen-R-Us
effect: Collin, the Annointed One only. Search your Resource Deck for a Minion Vampire and place it into play at the same location as Collin, the Annointed One. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Here's How You Eat It
effect: Xander only. The first time this turn Xander plays or attaches a card with a talent requirement, ignore that requirement. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Home Again
effect: When this event is played, starting with you and going clockwise, all players may search their Resource Deck for a character, show it to their opponents, and place it into their hands.

name: Homeric Insensitivity
effect: Name a Companion or Minion. That character cannot participate in a challenge this turn.

name: Hot Sheets
effect: Giles only. Search your Resource Deck for an event card, show it to your opponent, and palce it into your hand. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Hypnotic Grasp
effect: The Master only. Fatigue The Master to choose 2 cards at random from your opponent’s hand, and have her discard them. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Hypnotism
effect: Drusilla only. Look at your opponent’s hand. Choose a card in his hand and make him discard it. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Immolation-O-Gram
effect: During the Draw Step, players place their hands face-up on the table except for 2 cards of their choosing. Any further cards drawn this turn are placed face up as well. This effect lasts until the end of the turn.

name: It's The End of the World As We Know It
effect: You must have Ritual of Acathla assigned to one of the characters facing this challenge to defeat it. Angelus must be used to defeat this challenge.

name: Jenny Calendar
effect: Human. Demonology. Computer. Spellcraft. Jenny Calendar gains +1 Weirdness and +1 Smarts against challenges requiring the Spellcraft Trait.

name: Jigsaw Judge
effect: Assign to the warehouse. The disembodied arm must be attached to one of your characters at this location in order to face this challenge.

name: Kendra
effect: Kendra gains +1 Butt-Kicking while in a fight. Kendra gains +1 Smarts while facing a challenge.

name: Kendra
effect: Human. You do not lose Destiny Points when Kendra loses a fight.

name: Kendra
effect: Human. When Kendra wins a fight against a Vampire, you do not discard down to five cards.

name: Lily
effect: Human. If Lily faces a challenge with Buffy and the challenge is defeated, you gain 1 extra Destiny Point.

name: Love Sucks
effect: Assign to the Vampire Mansion. Buffy must be used to defeat this challenge.

name: Machiavellian Ingenuity
effect: When resolving a fight or challenge, discard Machiavellian Ingenuity to replace this character’s Butt-Kicking with his Weirdness. Talent stacks are excluded from this effect.

name: Mark of Eyghon
effect: During challenges this character gains the Occult Trait and +1 Weirdness. This item cannot be swapped unless it is swapped to Buffy.

name: Master of Ceremonies
effect: Collin, the Annointed One only. The next time Collin, the Annointed One ascends this turn, the Destiny Requirement for that ascension is 0. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Mr. Pointy
effect: Kendra only. If Kendra starts a fight, choose Smarts or Butt-Kicking. The chosen talent is now the resolving talent for this fight.

name: Mummy's Seal
effect: This character can not be discarded by or for card effects.

name: My Bloody Valentine
effect: Angelus must be used to defeat this challenge.

name: Natural History Museum
effect: If a challenge can legally be played at this location, it must be played here.

name: New Dad in Town
effect: Assign to 1630 Revello Drive (Summer’s House). Ted Buchanan must be used to defeat this challenge.

name: No More Soul
effect: Angelus only. Discard either Angel, an item, or a skill in play. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Octarus
effect: Supernatural Assassin. If Octarus wins a fight, you may discard 2 action cards from your hand during the fight’s resolution to keep him from fatiguing.

name: Orb of Thesulah
effect: Discard Orb of Thesulah to gain +3 Smarts during a challenge.

name: Oz
effect: Human. Oz gains +2 Charm when at the same location as Willow.

name: Oz
effect: Werewolf. During the Refresh Step, if it is day, send Oz’s level 2 to the Crypt. Any other attached cards remain attached.

name: PDA
effect: Until the end of the turn this event is played no characters may ascend.

name: Principal Snyder
effect: Human. Demonology. Principal Snyder gains +1 Smarts and +1 Weirdness when at any school location.

name: Ritual of Acathla
effect: Character needs Demonology to attach. During the End Step, you may fatigue this character and another character here with the Spellcraft Trait to send Ritual of Acathla to the Crypt, and search your Challenge Deck for any challenge and place it in play at an eligible location. Shuffle your Challenge Deck afterward.

name: Ritual of Eligor
effect: Assign to the warehouse. Drusilla must be used to defeat this challenge. When defeated, Drusilla gains +2 Butt-Kicking until she is discarded. Trait Requirement: Spellcraft

name: Ritual of Restoration
effect: Character needs Spellcraft to attach. Fatigue assigned character to take a character from your discard pile and shuffle it back into your Resource Deck.

name: Rocket Launcher
effect: Discard Rocket Launcher to gain +3 Butt-Kicking during a challenge.

name: Rupert Giles
effect: Human. Demonology. Spellcraft. If Giles starts a fight against a character with the Spellcraft, Demonology, or Occult Traits, any cards played into the Talent Stack for Butt-Kicking are increased by 1.

name: Rupert's Pad
effect: Once per turn during the Resource Step, you may fatigue your Hero or Villian here to retrieve 1 skill or item with a talent requirement from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Silver Locket
effect: Discard Silver Locket to gain +3 Charm during a challenge.

name: Slay Industries
effect: Kendra only. If Kendra wins this fight, attach this action card to her. While this card is attached, Kendra gains +1 Butt-Kicking.

name: Slayer's Burden
effect: Until the end of the turn this event is played, no characters may Stunt-Double. No characters may Stunt-Double for a Slayer for the remainder of the game and vice-versa.

name: Soda Machine Raid
effect: If there is a location in Sunnydale with no location card, you may retrieve a legal location from your Crypt and place it there.

name: Something Fishy This Way Comes
effect: Assign to an outdoor location. Coach Marin must be used to defeat this challenge. Trait Requirement: Occult

name: Something Weird
effect: For the remainder of the game, all players need 2 extra Destiny Points to win the game.

name: Spike
effect: Vampire. Spike may not start a fight. When Spike faces a challenge, any cards you place in a talent stack for Smarts are increased by 1.

name: Spike's Car
effect: If a Vampire has this item, the Vampire may move once during day turns. If Spike has this item, he can move twice during day turns instead.

name: St. Du Lac Mausoleum
effect: Once per turn, you may fatigue your character here to search your Resource Deck for an item that can legally be attached to that character and attach it. Reshuffle your Resource Deck.

name: Sunnydale City Morgue
effect: Once per turn, you may fatigue one of your characters here to search your discard pile for 1 Companion or Minion and place it in your hand.

name: Sunset Club
effect: During the Prologue Step, any characters here gain the Vampire Trait until the end of the turn.

name: Surprise
effect: Cordelia only. Move Cordelia here to face this challenge. This does not count as a move. Cordelia does not fatigue when you resolve this challenge. Send to the crypt after use.

name: Tattoo Remover (Acid)
effect: Fatigue this character during the Resource Step to discard one item attached to another character at the same location.

name: Ted Buchanan
effect: Robot. Once per turn, discard an item attached to Ted to refresh him. If the 50’s Time Capsule is in play and Ted is defeated in a fight, move him there fatigued instead of to the discard pile.

name: The Dark Age
effect: Assign to Ethan’s Costume Shop. If Mark of Eyghon is attached to a character facing this challenge, the controlling player receives 1 extra Destiny Point. Trait Requirement: Occult

name: The Judge
effect: Demon. You must defeat the Jigsaw Judge challenge before you can place The Judge into play. You may discard The Judge from your hand to search your Challenge Deck for Jigsaw Judge, shuffle the remaining challenges, and place Jigsaw Judge on top.

name: The Look
effect: When resolving a fight or challenge, discard The Look to replace this character’s Butt-Kicking with her Charm. Talent stacks are excluded from this effect.

name: The Master
effect: Vampire. Spellcraft. Once during the Resource Step, fatigue The Master to choose an opponent to discard 2 cards from her hand.

name: The Plan
effect: When this event is played, all players may look at their Challenge Deck and rearrange it in any order.

name: To Be Continued …
effect: If you do not defeat this challenge, the amount of Destiny Points you lose is lowered by 1.

name: Total Lecture Overload
effect: If none of your opponent’s characters have refreshed during this Step, choose one of your opponent’s fatigued characters in play. That character does not refresh during this step.

name: Tremors
effect: The Master only. You can only use this effect if you have 2 or more Destiny Points. All players lose 2 Destiny Points. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Tweed Mail
effect: Discard Tweed Mail during a fight to choose a talent. Character gains +1 to this talent for this fight. If this card is attached to Giles, it does not count towards your 2 item limit. Each character may only have 1 Tweed Mail attached.

name: Uncle Enyos
effect: Human. Spellcraft. Occult. Demonology.

name: Unwelcome Surprise
effect: Stunt-Doubling is prohibited during this fight.

name: Vampire Mansion
effect: If Spike, Drusilla and/or Angelus are here during the Prologue Step, each of those characters at Vampire Mansion gain +1 to any talent of your choosing for the remainder of the turn.

name: Vampiric Expertise
effect: Angel only. Send a Minion Vampire at Angel’s location to the Crypt. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Video Camera
effect: Fatigue this item during the Resource Step to look at an opponent’s hand.

name: Visions
effect: Drusilla only. Look at the top 10 cards of any player’s Resource Deck and rearrange them in any order. Draw a card. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Wavering Power
effect: Drusilla only. Whenever Drusilla uses her character card power to draw cards, she draws 1 additional card. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Weapon's Expert
effect: During a fight, choose one of the items attached to this character and double its Butt-Kicking bonus for this fight. You can choose a different item each time you fight. Each character may only have 1 Weapon’s Expert attached.

name: What Comes Around …
effect: Giles only. Attach this card to Giles when he is used to defeat a challenge with a Trait Requirement. As long as this card remains attached, Giles gains all the Traits that were required to defeat the Challenge.

name: What Doesn't Kill You …
effect: Spike only. Spike gains +1 Butt-Kicking, Smarts and Weirdness. Limit 1 per deck.

name: Whistler
effect: Demon. While Whistler is in play, players may look at any Challenge Deck without rearranging the order of the challenges. If Whistler is discarded or sent to the Crypt, all players shuffle their Challenge Deck.

name: Willow Rosenberg
effect: Human. Spellcraft. Whenever your opponent faces a challenge at Willows’ location, you draw 6 cards instead of 3.

name: Willy
effect: Human. If a player has 4 or more challenges in play, you may fatigue Willy during the Resource Step and choose an opponent. That opponent must choose one of her challenges and shuffle it back into her Challenge Deck.

name: Willy's Bar
effect: Once per turn during the Resource Step, you may fatigue your character here to take the top card or your Challenge Deck and place it at the bottom of your Challenge Deck.

name: Wisdom
effect: When resolving a fight or challenge, discard Wisdom to replace this character’s Butt-Kicking with her Smarts. Talent stacks are excluded from this effect.

name: Wrath of Angelus
effect: If you defeat this challenge, you may choose 1 participating Villian or all participating Minions. The chosen character(s) do not fatigue from this fight or challenge. This card can only be played at night. Send to the Crypt after use.

name: Xander
effect: Xander is considered a Hero instead of a Companion. Xander gains +1 to all of his talents for meeting the talent requirements on actions, skills and items.

name: Xander
effect: Human. Xander may Stunt-Double for Cordelia while fatigued. During the Movement Step, if Xander is not in Sunnydale Park, he may move to Cordelia’s location instead of an adjacent location.
